components.name: [unnamed]
components.text: I don't any responsibility at all.

components.name: intro_message
components.content:
Welcome everyone ! ! !  After quite a bit of effort, my personal website is finally online.

Whether you came here through a link, entered in the URL yourself, or maybe stumbled onto my website accidentally, feel free to take a look around. All the contents on this website can be accessed through the navigation menu on the left.
Here, you can find out {more} about me, {who I am}, {what I can do}, and {what my interests are}. You can also take a detailed look at my past {projects} and, if you'd like sample my past works first hand, try these {web games} that I wrote in Javascript. In addition, I will also be maintaining a personal {blog} in which I will offer some fun discussions on various technical subjects.
If you like the design of my website and want to find out how it is done, you can read about it {here} or check out the source code from this Github {repository}.

components.name: new_content
components.content: 1. My first {blog post}, "A Cautionary Tale on the Dangers of Deploying AI in Social Media", has been added.
